effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Paralyzed.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, the attack does 30 damage and Electabuzz does 10 damage to itself.

description.en: Normally found near power plants, it can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
